name: Builtin Function Validation Test
description: Test builtin function parameter validation using kickass.json (Phase 1.2)

testCases.name: Valid builtin function calls produce no errors
testCases.description: Functions with correct parameter count should not generate warnings

testCases.name: Invalid parameter count generates warnings
testCases.description: Functions with wrong parameter count should generate warnings

testCases.name: Unknown functions generate errors
testCases.description: Unknown function calls should generate undefined symbol errors

testCases.name: Builtin functions appear in completion
testCases.description: Builtin functions should be available in completion
